instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Mobile data . Choose from the the options below.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Mobile data . Scroll down to view a list of applications sorted from most data used to least data used. Select an application to view more details.
